Require Import Rbase.
Require Import Rfunctions.
Require Import SeqSeries.
Require Import Rtrigo_def.
Require Import OmegaTactic.
Local Open Scope R_scope.

Definition A1 (x:R) (N:nat) : R :=
  sum_f_R0 (fun k:nat => (-1) ^ k / INR (fact (2 * k)) * x ^ (2 * k)) N.

Definition B1 (x:R) (N:nat) : R :=
  sum_f_R0 (fun k:nat => (-1) ^ k / INR (fact (2 * k + 1)) * x ^ (2 * k + 1))
    N.

Definition C1 (x y:R) (N:nat) : R :=
  sum_f_R0 (fun k:nat => (-1) ^ k / INR (fact (2 * k)) * (x + y) ^ (2 * k)) N.

Definition Reste1 (x y:R) (N:nat) : R :=
  sum_f_R0
    (fun k:nat =>
       sum_f_R0
         (fun l:nat =>
            (-1) ^ S (l + k) / INR (fact (2 * S (l + k))) *
            x ^ (2 * S (l + k)) * ((-1) ^ (N - l) / INR (fact (2 * (N - l)))) *
            y ^ (2 * (N - l))) (pred (N - k))) (pred N).

Definition Reste2 (x y:R) (N:nat) : R :=
  sum_f_R0
    (fun k:nat =>
       sum_f_R0
         (fun l:nat =>
            (-1) ^ S (l + k) / INR (fact (2 * S (l + k) + 1)) *
            x ^ (2 * S (l + k) + 1) *
            ((-1) ^ (N - l) / INR (fact (2 * (N - l) + 1))) *
            y ^ (2 * (N - l) + 1)) (pred (N - k))) (
    pred N).

Definition Reste (x y:R) (N:nat) : R := Reste2 x y N - Reste1 x y (S N).

(* Here is the main result that will be used to prove that (cos (x+y))=(cos x)(cos y)-(sin x)(sin y) *)

forall (x y : R) (n : nat),
(0 < n)%nat ->
A1 x (S n) * A1 y (S n) - B1 x n * B1 y n +
Reste x y n = C1 x y (S n)


forall (x y : R) (n : nat),
(0 < n)%nat ->
A1 x (S n) * A1 y (S n) - B1 x n * B1 y n +
Reste x y n = C1 x y (S n)


x, y:R
n:nat
H:(0 < n)%nat
A1 x (S n) * A1 y (S n) - B1 x n * B1 y n +
Reste x y n = C1 x y (S n)


x, y:R
n:nat
H:(0 < n)%nat
sum_f_R0
  (fun k : nat =>
   (-1) ^ k / INR (fact (2 * k)) * x ^ (2 * k)) (S n) *
sum_f_R0
  (fun k : nat =>
   (-1) ^ k / INR (fact (2 * k)) * y ^ (2 * k)) (S n) -
sum_f_R0
  (fun k : nat =>
   (-1) ^ k / INR (fact (2 * k + 1)) * x ^ (2 * k + 1))
  n *
sum_f_R0
  (fun k : nat =>
   (-1) ^ k / INR (fact (2 * k + 1)) * y ^ (2 * k + 1))
  n + Reste x y n = C1 x y (S n)


x, y:R
n:nat
H:(0 < n)%nat
sum_f_R0
  (fun k : nat =>
   sum_f_R0
     (fun p : nat =>
      (-1) ^ p / INR (fact (2 * p)) * x ^ (2 * p) *
      ((-1) ^ (k - p) / INR (fact (2 * (k - p))) *
       y ^ (2 * (k - p)))) k) (S n) +
sum_f_R0
  (fun k : nat =>
   sum_f_R0
     (fun l : nat =>
      (-1) ^ S (l + k) / INR (fact (2 * S (l + k))) *
      x ^ (2 * S (l + k)) *
      ((-1) ^ (S n - l) / INR (fact (2 * (S n - l))) *
       y ^ (2 * (S n - l)))) (Init.Nat.pred (S n - k)))
  (Init.Nat.pred (S n)) -
sum_f_R0
  (fun k : nat =>
   (-1) ^ k / INR (fact (2 * k + 1)) * x ^ (2 * k + 1))
  n *
sum_f_R0
  (fun k : nat =>
   (-1) ^ k / INR (fact (2 * k + 1)) * y ^ (2 * k + 1))
  n + Reste x y n = C1 x y (S n)
x, y:R
n:nat
H:(0 < n)%nat
(0 < S n)%nat


x, y:R
n:nat
H:(0 < n)%nat
sum_f_R0
  (fun k : nat =>
   sum_f_R0
     (fun p : nat =>
      (-1) ^ p / INR (fact (2 * p)) * x ^ (2 * p) *
      ((-1) ^ (k - p) / INR (fact (2 * (k - p))) *
       y ^ (2 * (k - p)))) k) (S n) +
sum_f_R0
  (fun k : nat =>
   sum_f_R0
     (fun l : nat =>
      (-1) ^ S (l + k) / INR (fact (2 * S (l + k))) *
      x ^ (2 * S (l + k)) *
      ((-1) ^ (S n - l) / INR (fact (2 * (S n - l))) *
       y ^ (2 * (S n - l)))) (Init.Nat.pred (S n - k)))
  (Init.Nat.pred (S n)) -
(sum_f_R0
   (fun k : nat =>
    sum_f_R0
      (fun p : nat =>
       (-1) ^ p / INR (fact (2 * p + 1)) *
       x ^ (2 * p + 1) *
       ((-1) ^ (k - p) / INR (fact (2 * (k - p) + 1)) *
        y ^ (2 * (k - p) + 1))) k) n +
 sum_f_R0
   (fun k : nat =>
    sum_f_R0
      (fun l : nat =>
       (-1) ^ S (l + k) /
       INR (fact (2 * S (l + k) + 1)) *
       x ^ (2 * S (l + k) + 1) *
       ((-1) ^ (n - l) / INR (fact (2 * (n - l) + 1)) *
        y ^ (2 * (n - l) + 1)))
      (Init.Nat.pred (n - k))) (Init.Nat.pred n)) +
Reste x y n = C1 x y (S n)
x, y:R
n:nat
H:(0 < n)%nat
(0 < S n)%nat


x, y:R
n:nat
H:(0 < n)%nat
sum_f_R0
  (fun k : nat =>
   sum_f_R0
     (fun p : nat =>
      (-1) ^ p / INR (fact (2 * p)) * x ^ (2 * p) *
      ((-1) ^ (k - p) / INR (fact (2 * (k - p))) *
       y ^ (2 * (k - p)))) k) (S n) +
sum_f_R0
  (fun k : nat =>
   sum_f_R0
     (fun l : nat =>
      (-1) ^ S (l + k) / INR (fact (2 * S (l + k))) *
      x ^ (2 * S (l + k)) *
      ((-1) ^ (S n - l) / INR (fact (2 * (S n - l))) *
       y ^ (2 * (S n - l)))) (Init.Nat.pred (S n - k)))
  (Init.Nat.pred (S n)) -
(sum_f_R0
   (fun k : nat =>
    sum_f_R0
      (fun p : nat =>
       (-1) ^ p / INR (fact (2 * p + 1)) *
       x ^ (2 * p + 1) *
       ((-1) ^ (k - p) / INR (fact (2 * (k - p) + 1)) *
        y ^ (2 * (k - p) + 1))) k) n +
 sum_f_R0
   (fun k : nat =>
    sum_f_R0
      (fun l : nat =>
       (-1) ^ S (l + k) /
       INR (fact (2 * S (l + k) + 1)) *
       x ^ (2 * S (l + k) + 1) *
       ((-1) ^ (n - l) / INR (fact (2 * (n - l) + 1)) *
        y ^ (2 * (n - l) + 1)))
      (Init.Nat.pred (n - k))) (Init.Nat.pred n)) +
(Reste2 x y n - Reste1 x y (S n)) = C1 x y (S n)

n:nat

(0 < S n)%nat

  (fun k : nat =>
   sum_f_R0

      ((-1) ^ (k - p) / INR (fact (2 * (k - p))) *
       y ^ (2 * (k - p)))) k) (S n) + Reste1 x y (S n) -

       x ^ (2 * p + 1) *

      (Init.Nat.pred (n - k))) (Init.Nat.pred n)) +
(Reste2 x y n - Reste1 x y (S n)) = C1 x y (S n)

Reste1 x y (S n) =

(Reste2 x y n - Reste1 x y (S n)) = C1 x y (S n)

      y ^ (2 * (k - l))) k) (S n) + Reste1 x y (S n) -

(0 < S n)%nat


x, y:R
n:nat
H:(0 < n)%nat
sin_nnn:=fun n0 : nat =>
match n0 with
| 0%nat => 0
| S p =>
    (-1) ^ S p / INR (fact (2 * S p)) *
    sum_f_R0
      (fun l : nat =>
       C (2 * S p) (S (2 * l)) *
       x ^ S (2 * l) * y ^ S (2 * (p - l))) p
end:nat -> R
sum_f_R0
  (fun k : nat =>
   (-1) ^ k / INR (fact (2 * k)) *
   sum_f_R0
     (fun l : nat =>
      C (2 * k) (2 * l) * x ^ (2 * l) *
      y ^ (2 * (k - l))) k) (S n) + Reste1 x y (S n) -
(sum_f_R0
   (fun k : nat =>
    sum_f_R0
      (fun p : nat =>
       (-1) ^ p / INR (fact (2 * p + 1)) *
       x ^ (2 * p + 1) *
       ((-1) ^ (k - p) / INR (fact (2 * (k - p) + 1)) *
        y ^ (2 * (k - p) + 1))) k) n + Reste2 x y n) +
(Reste2 x y n - Reste1 x y (S n)) = C1 x y (S n)
x, y:R
n:nat
H:(0 < n)%nat
sum_f_R0
  (fun k : nat =>
   (-1) ^ k / INR (fact (2 * k)) *
   sum_f_R0
     (fun l : nat =>
      C (2 * k) (2 * l) * x ^ (2 * l) *
      y ^ (2 * (k - l))) k) 
  (S n) =
sum_f_R0
  (fun k : nat =>
   sum_f_R0
     (fun p : nat =>
      (-1) ^ p / INR (fact (2 * p)) * x ^ (2 * p) *
      ((-1) ^ (k - p) / INR (fact (2 * (k - p))) *
       y ^ (2 * (k - p)))) k) 
  (S n)

  (Init.Nat.pred n)

      INR (fact (2 * S (l + k) + 1)) *

      ((-1) ^ (n - l) / INR (fact (2 * (n - l) + 1)) *
       y ^ (2 * (n - l) + 1))) 
     (Init.Nat.pred (n - k))) 
  (Init.Nat.pred n)

H:(0 < n)%nat
Reste1 x y (S n) =
sum_f_R0
  (fun k : nat =>
   sum_f_R0
     (fun l : nat =>
      (-1) ^ S (l + k) / INR (fact (2 * S (l + k))) *
      x ^ (2 * S (l + k)) *
      ((-1) ^ (S n - l) / INR (fact (2 * (S n - l))) *
       y ^ (2 * (S n - l)))) 
     (Init.Nat.pred (S n - k))) 
  (Init.Nat.pred (S n))
x, y:R
n:nat
H:(0 < n)%nat
(0 < S n)%nat


x, y:R
n:nat
H:(0 < n)%nat
sin_nnn:=fun n0 : nat =>
match n0 with
| 0%nat => 0
| S p =>
    (-1) ^ S p / INR (fact (2 * S p)) *
    sum_f_R0
      (fun l : nat =>
       C (2 * S p) (S (2 * l)) *
       x ^ S (2 * l) * y ^ S (2 * (p - l))) p
end:nat -> R
sum_f_R0
  (fun k : nat =>
   (-1) ^ k / INR (fact (2 * k)) *
   sum_f_R0
     (fun l : nat =>
      C (2 * k) (2 * l) * x ^ (2 * l) *
      y ^ (2 * (k - l))) k) 
  (S n) + sum_f_R0 sin_nnn (S n) = 
C1 x y (S n)
x, y:R

       x ^ S (2 * l) * y ^ S (2 * (p - l))) p

       y ^ (2 * (k - p) + 1))) k) n

      (-1) ^ S (l + k) /
      INR (fact (2 * S (l + k) + 1)) *
      x ^ (2 * S (l + k) + 1) *
      ((-1) ^ (n - l) / INR (fact (2 * (n - l) + 1)) *

  (Init.Nat.pred n)

end:nat -> R
H0:(0 <= S n)%nat
1 / 1 * (1 / (1 * 1) * 1 * 1) + 0 = 1 / 1 * 1
x, y:R
n:nat
H:(0 < n)%nat
sin_nnn:=fun n0 : nat =>
match n0 with
| 0%nat => 0
| S p =>
    (-1) ^ S p / INR (fact (2 * S p)) *
    sum_f_R0
      (fun l : nat =>
       C (2 * S p) (S (2 * l)) *
       x ^ S (2 * l) * y ^ S (2 * (p - l))) p
end:nat -> R
i:nat
H0:(S i <= S n)%nat
Hreci:(i <= S n)%nat ->
(-1) ^ i / INR (fact (2 * i)) *
sum_f_R0
  (fun l : nat =>
   C (2 * i) (2 * l) * x ^ (2 * l) *
   y ^ (2 * (i - l))) i + 
sin_nnn i =
(-1) ^ i / INR (fact (2 * i)) *
(x + y) ^ (2 * i)
(-1) ^ S i / INR (fact (2 * S i)) *
sum_f_R0
  (fun l : nat =>
   C (2 * S i) (2 * l) * x ^ (2 * l) *
   y ^ (2 * (S i - l))) 
  (S i) + sin_nnn (S i) =
(-1) ^ S i / INR (fact (2 * S i)) *
(x + y) ^ (2 * S i)
x, y:R
n:nat
H:(0 < n)%nat
sin_nnn:=fun n0 : nat =>
match n0 with
| 0%nat => 0
| S p =>
    (-1) ^ S p / INR (fact (2 * S p)) *
    sum_f_R0
      (fun l : nat =>
       C (2 * S p) (S (2 * l)) *
       x ^ S (2 * l) * y ^ S (2 * (p - l))) p
end:nat -> R
sum_f_R0 sin_nnn (S n) =
-
sum_f_R0
  (fun k : nat =>
   sum_f_R0
     (fun p : nat =>
      (-1) ^ p / INR (fact (2 * p + 1)) *
      x ^ (2 * p + 1) *
      ((-1) ^ (k - p) / INR (fact (2 * (k - p) + 1)) *
       y ^ (2 * (k - p) + 1))) k) n
x, y:R
n:nat
H:(0 < n)%nat
sum_f_R0
  (fun k : nat =>
   (-1) ^ k / INR (fact (2 * k)) *
   sum_f_R0
     (fun l : nat =>
      C (2 * k) (2 * l) * x ^ (2 * l) *
      y ^ (2 * (k - l))) k) 
  (S n) =
sum_f_R0
  (fun k : nat =>
   sum_f_R0
     (fun p : nat =>
      (-1) ^ p / INR (fact (2 * p)) * x ^ (2 * p) *
      ((-1) ^ (k - p) / INR (fact (2 * (k - p))) *
       y ^ (2 * (k - p)))) k) 
  (S n)

Reste2 x y n =
sum_f_R0
  (fun k : nat =>
   sum_f_R0
     (fun l : nat =>
      (-1) ^ S (l + k) /
      INR (fact (2 * S (l + k) + 1)) *
      x ^ (2 * S (l + k) + 1) *
      ((-1) ^ (n - l) / INR (fact (2 * (n - l) + 1)) *
       y ^ (2 * (n - l) + 1))) 
     (Init.Nat.pred (n - k))) 
  (Init.Nat.pred n)

  (Init.Nat.pred (S n))

     (Init.Nat.pred (S n - k))) 
  (Init.Nat.pred (S n))
x, y:R
n:nat
H:(0 < n)%nat
(0 < S n)%nat


x, y:R
n:nat
H:(0 < n)%nat
sin_nnn:=fun n0 : nat =>
match n0 with
| 0%nat => 0
| S p =>
    (-1) ^ S p / INR (fact (2 * S p)) *
    sum_f_R0
      (fun l : nat =>
       C (2 * S p) (S (2 * l)) *
       x ^ S (2 * l) * y ^ S (2 * (p - l))) p
end:nat -> R
i:nat
H0:(S i <= S n)%nat
Hreci:(i <= S n)%nat ->
(-1) ^ i / INR (fact (2 * i)) *
sum_f_R0
  (fun l : nat =>
   C (2 * i) (2 * l) * x ^ (2 * l) *
   y ^ (2 * (i - l))) i + 
sin_nnn i =
(-1) ^ i / INR (fact (2 * i)) *
(x + y) ^ (2 * i)
Wn:=fun i0 : nat =>
C (2 * S i) i0 * x ^ i0 * y ^ (2 * S i - i0):nat -> R
sum_f_R0
  (fun l : nat =>
   C (2 * S i) (2 * l) * x ^ (2 * l) *
   y ^ (2 * (S i - l))) 
  (S i) +
sum_f_R0
  (fun l : nat =>
   C (2 * S i) (S (2 * l)) * x ^ S (2 * l) *
   y ^ S (2 * (i - l))) i =
sum_f_R0
  (fun i0 : nat =>
   C (2 * S i) i0 * x ^ i0 * y ^ (2 * S i - i0))
  (2 * S i)
x, y:R
n:nat
H:(0 < n)%nat
sin_nnn:=fun n0 : nat =>
match n0 with
| 0%nat => 0
| S p =>
    (-1) ^ S p / INR (fact (2 * S p)) *
    sum_f_R0
      (fun l : nat =>
       C (2 * S p) (S (2 * l)) *
       x ^ S (2 * l) * y ^ S (2 * (p - l))) p
end:nat -> R
sum_f_R0 sin_nnn (S n) =
-
sum_f_R0
  (fun k : nat =>
   sum_f_R0
     (fun p : nat =>
      (-1) ^ p / INR (fact (2 * p + 1)) *
      x ^ (2 * p + 1) *
      ((-1) ^ (k - p) / INR (fact (2 * (k - p) + 1)) *
       y ^ (2 * (k - p) + 1))) k) n
x, y:R
n:nat
H:(0 < n)%nat
sum_f_R0
  (fun k : nat =>
   (-1) ^ k / INR (fact (2 * k)) *
   sum_f_R0
     (fun l : nat =>
      C (2 * k) (2 * l) * x ^ (2 * l) *
      y ^ (2 * (k - l))) k) 
  (S n) =
sum_f_R0
  (fun k : nat =>
   sum_f_R0
     (fun p : nat =>
      (-1) ^ p / INR (fact (2 * p)) * x ^ (2 * p) *
      ((-1) ^ (k - p) / INR (fact (2 * (k - p))) *
       y ^ (2 * (k - p)))) k) 
  (S n)
x, y:R
n:nat
H:(0 < n)%nat
Reste2 x y n =
sum_f_R0
  (fun k : nat =>
   sum_f_R0
     (fun l : nat =>
      (-1) ^ S (l + k) /
      INR (fact (2 * S (l + k) + 1)) *
      x ^ (2 * S (l + k) + 1) *
      ((-1) ^ (n - l) / INR (fact (2 * (n - l) + 1)) *
       y ^ (2 * (n - l) + 1))) 
     (Init.Nat.pred (n - k))) 
  (Init.Nat.pred n)
x, y:R
n:nat

  (fun k : nat =>
   sum_f_R0

      (-1) ^ S (l + k) / INR (fact (2 * S (l + k))) *
      x ^ (2 * S (l + k)) *
      ((-1) ^ (S n - l) / INR (fact (2 * (S n - l))) *
       y ^ (2 * (S n - l)))) 
     (Init.Nat.pred (S n - k))) 
  (Init.Nat.pred (S n))

       C (2 * S p) (S (2 * l)) *
       x ^ S (2 * l) * y ^ S (2 * (p - l))) p
end:nat -> R
sum_f_R0 sin_nnn (S n) =
-
sum_f_R0
  (fun k : nat =>
   sum_f_R0
     (fun p : nat =>
      (-1) ^ p / INR (fact (2 * p + 1)) *
      x ^ (2 * p + 1) *
      ((-1) ^ (k - p) / INR (fact (2 * (k - p) + 1)) *
       y ^ (2 * (k - p) + 1))) k) n
x, y:R
n:nat
H:(0 < n)%nat
sum_f_R0
  (fun k : nat =>
   (-1) ^ k / INR (fact (2 * k)) *
   sum_f_R0
     (fun l : nat =>
      C (2 * k) (2 * l) * x ^ (2 * l) *
      y ^ (2 * (k - l))) k) 
  (S n) =
sum_f_R0
  (fun k : nat =>
   sum_f_R0
     (fun p : nat =>
      (-1) ^ p / INR (fact (2 * p)) * x ^ (2 * p) *
      ((-1) ^ (k - p) / INR (fact (2 * (k - p))) *
       y ^ (2 * (k - p)))) k) 
  (S n)
x, y:R
n:nat
H:(0 < n)%nat
Reste2 x y n =
sum_f_R0
  (fun k : nat =>
   sum_f_R0
     (fun l : nat =>
      (-1) ^ S (l + k) /
      INR (fact (2 * S (l + k) + 1)) *
      x ^ (2 * S (l + k) + 1) *
      ((-1) ^ (n - l) / INR (fact (2 * (n - l) + 1)) *
       y ^ (2 * (n - l) + 1))) 
     (Init.Nat.pred (n - k))) 
  (Init.Nat.pred n)
x, y:R
n:nat
H:(0 < n)%nat
Reste1 x y (S n) =
sum_f_R0
  (fun k : nat =>
   sum_f_R0
     (fun l : nat =>
      (-1) ^ S (l + k) / INR (fact (2 * S (l + k))) *
      x ^ (2 * S (l + k)) *
      ((-1) ^ (S n - l) / INR (fact (2 * (S n - l))) *
       y ^ (2 * (S n - l)))) 
     (Init.Nat.pred (S n - k))) 
  (Init.Nat.pred (S n))
x, y:R
n:nat
H:(0 < n)%nat
(0 < S n)%nat


x, y:R
n:nat
H:(0 < n)%nat
sin_nnn:=fun n0 : nat =>
match n0 with
| 0%nat => 0
| S p =>
    (-1) ^ S p / INR (fact (2 * S p)) *
    sum_f_R0
      (fun l : nat =>
       C (2 * S p) (S (2 * l)) *
       x ^ S (2 * l) * y ^ S (2 * (p - l))) p
end:nat -> R
i:nat
H0:(S i <= S n)%nat
Hreci:(i <= S n)%nat ->
(-1) ^ i / INR (fact (2 * i)) *
sum_f_R0
  (fun l : nat =>
   C (2 * i) (2 * l) * x ^ (2 * l) *
   y ^ (2 * (i - l))) i + 
sin_nnn i =
(-1) ^ i / INR (fact (2 * i)) *
(x + y) ^ (2 * i)
Wn:=fun i1 : nat =>
C (2 * S i) i1 * x ^ i1 * y ^ (2 * S i - i1):nat -> R
i0:nat
H1:(i0 <= i)%nat
C (2 * S i) (S (2 * i0)) * x ^ S (2 * i0) *
y ^ (2 * S i - S (2 * i0)) =
C (2 * S i) (S (2 * i0)) * x ^ S (2 * i0) *
y ^ S (2 * (i - i0))
x, y:R

| S p =>
    (-1) ^ S p / INR (fact (2 * S p)) *
    sum_f_R0
      (fun l : nat =>
       C (2 * S p) (S (2 * l)) *
       x ^ S (2 * l) * y ^ S (2 * (p - l))) p
end:nat -> R
i:nat
H0:(S i <= S n)%nat
Hreci:(i <= S n)%nat ->
(-1) ^ i / INR (fact (2 * i)) *
sum_f_R0
  (fun l : nat =>
   C (2 * i) (2 * l) * x ^ (2 * l) *
   y ^ (2 * (i - l))) i + 
sin_nnn i =
(-1) ^ i / INR (fact (2 * i)) *
(x + y) ^ (2 * i)
Wn:=fun i0 : nat =>
C (2 * S i) i0 * x ^ i0 * y ^ (2 * S i - i0):nat -> R
sum_f_R0 (fun l : nat => Wn (2 * l)%nat) (S i) =
sum_f_R0
  (fun l : nat =>
   C (2 * S i) (2 * l) * x ^ (2 * l) *
   y ^ (2 * (S i - l))) 
  (S i)
x, y:R
n:nat
H:(0 < n)%nat
sin_nnn:=fun n0 : nat =>
match n0 with
| 0%nat => 0
| S p =>
    (-1) ^ S p / INR (fact (2 * S p)) *
    sum_f_R0
      (fun l : nat =>
       C (2 * S p) (S (2 * l)) *
       x ^ S (2 * l) * y ^ S (2 * (p - l))) p
end:nat -> R
sum_f_R0 sin_nnn (S n) =
-
sum_f_R0
  (fun k : nat =>
   sum_f_R0
     (fun p : nat =>
      (-1) ^ p / INR (fact (2 * p + 1)) *
      x ^ (2 * p + 1) *
      ((-1) ^ (k - p) / INR (fact (2 * (k - p) + 1)) *
       y ^ (2 * (k - p) + 1))) k) n
x, y:R
n:nat
H:(0 < n)%nat
sum_f_R0
  (fun k : nat =>
   (-1) ^ k / INR (fact (2 * k)) *
   sum_f_R0
     (fun l : nat =>
      C (2 * k) (2 * l) * x ^ (2 * l) *
      y ^ (2 * (k - l))) k) 
  (S n) =
sum_f_R0
  (fun k : nat =>
   sum_f_R0
     (fun p : nat =>
      (-1) ^ p / INR (fact (2 * p)) * x ^ (2 * p) *
      ((-1) ^ (k - p) / INR (fact (2 * (k - p))) *
       y ^ (2 * (k - p)))) k)

n:nat
H:(0 < n)%nat
Reste2 x y n =
sum_f_R0
  (fun k : nat =>
   sum_f_R0
     (fun l : nat =>
      (-1) ^ S (l + k) /
      INR (fact (2 * S (l + k) + 1)) *
      x ^ (2 * S (l + k) + 1) *
      ((-1) ^ (n - l) / INR (fact (2 * (n - l) + 1)) *
       y ^ (2 * (n - l) + 1))) 
     (Init.Nat.pred (n - k))) 
  (Init.Nat.pred n)
x, y:R
n:nat

  (Init.Nat.pred (S n))

H:(0 < n)%nat
(0 < S n)%nat


x, y:R
n:nat
H:(0 < n)%nat
sin_nnn:=fun n0 : nat =>
match n0 with
| 0%nat => 0
| S p =>
    (-1) ^ S p / INR (fact (2 * S p)) *
    sum_f_R0
      (fun l : nat =>
       C (2 * S p) (S (2 * l)) *
       x ^ S (2 * l) * y ^ S (2 * (p - l))) p
end:nat -> R
sum_f_R0 sin_nnn (S n) =
-
sum_f_R0
  (fun k : nat =>
   sum_f_R0
     (fun p : nat =>
      (-1) ^ p / INR (fact (2 * p + 1)) *
      x ^ (2 * p + 1) *
      ((-1) ^ (k - p) / INR (fact (2 * (k - p) + 1)) *
       y ^ (2 * (k - p) + 1))) k) n
x, y:R
n:nat
H:(0 < n)%nat
sum_f_R0
  (fun k : nat =>
   (-1) ^ k / INR (fact (2 * k)) *
   sum_f_R0
     (fun l : nat =>
      C (2 * k) (2 * l) * x ^ (2 * l) *
      y ^ (2 * (k - l))) k) 
  (S n) =
sum_f_R0
  (fun k : nat =>
   sum_f_R0
     (fun p : nat =>
      (-1) ^ p / INR (fact (2 * p)) * x ^ (2 * p) *
      ((-1) ^ (k - p) / INR (fact (2 * (k - p))) *
       y ^ (2 * (k - p)))) k) 
  (S n)
x, y:R
n:nat
H:(0 < n)%nat
Reste2 x y n =
sum_f_R0
  (fun k : nat =>
   sum_f_R0
     (fun l : nat =>
      (-1) ^ S (l + k) /
      INR (fact (2 * S (l + k) + 1)) *
      x ^ (2 * S (l + k) + 1) *
      ((-1) ^ (n - l) / INR (fact (2 * (n - l) + 1)) *
       y ^ (2 * (n - l) + 1))) 
     (Init.Nat.pred (n - k))) 
  (Init.Nat.pred n)
x, y:R
n:nat
H:(0 < n)%nat
Reste1 x y (S n) =
sum_f_R0
  (fun k : nat =>
   sum_f_R0
     (fun l : nat =>
      (-1) ^ S (l + k) / INR (fact (2 * S (l + k))) *
      x ^ (2 * S (l + k)) *
      ((-1) ^ (S n - l) / INR (fact (2 * (S n - l))) *
       y ^ (2 * (S n - l)))) 
     (Init.Nat.pred (S n - k))) 
  (Init.Nat.pred (S n))

end:nat -> R

sin_nnn:=fun n0 : nat =>
match n0 with
| 0%nat => 0
| S p =>
    (-1) ^ S p / INR (fact (2 * S p)) *
    sum_f_R0
      (fun l : nat =>
       C (2 * S p) (S (2 * l)) *
       x ^ S (2 * l) * y ^ S (2 * (p - l))) p
end:nat -> R
i:nat
H0:(i <= n)%nat
sin_nnn (S i) =
sum_f_R0
  (fun p : nat =>
   (-1) ^ p / INR (fact (2 * p + 1)) * x ^ (2 * p + 1) *
   ((-1) ^ (i - p) / INR (fact (2 * (i - p) + 1)) *
    y ^ (2 * (i - p) + 1))) i * -1

       x ^ S (2 * l) * y ^ S (2 * (p - l))) p
end:nat -> R

H:(0 < n)%nat
sin_nnn:=fun n0 : nat =>
match n0 with
| 0%nat => 0
| S p =>
    (-1) ^ S p / INR (fact (2 * S p)) *
    sum_f_R0
      (fun l : nat =>
       C (2 * S p) (S (2 * l)) *
       x ^ S (2 * l) * y ^ S (2 * (p - l))) p
end:nat -> R
(0 < S n)%nat
x, y:R
n:nat
H:(0 < n)%nat
sum_f_R0
  (fun k : nat =>
   (-1) ^ k / INR (fact (2 * k)) *
   sum_f_R0
     (fun l : nat =>
      C (2 * k) (2 * l) * x ^ (2 * l) *
      y ^ (2 * (k - l))) k) 
  (S n) =
sum_f_R0
  (fun k : nat =>
   sum_f_R0
     (fun p : nat =>
      (-1) ^ p / INR (fact (2 * p)) * x ^ (2 * p) *
      ((-1) ^ (k - p) / INR (fact (2 * (k - p))) *
       y ^ (2 * (k - p)))) k) 
  (S n)
x, y:R
n:nat
H:(0 < n)%nat
Reste2 x y n =
sum_f_R0
  (fun k : nat =>
   sum_f_R0
     (fun l : nat =>
      (-1) ^ S (l + k) /
      INR (fact (2 * S (l + k) + 1)) *
      x ^ (2 * S (l + k) + 1) *
      ((-1) ^ (n - l) / INR (fact (2 * (n - l) + 1)) *
       y ^ (2 * (n - l) + 1))) 
     (Init.Nat.pred (n - k))) 
  (Init.Nat.pred n)
x, y:R
n:nat
H:(0 < n)%nat
Reste1 x y (S n) =
sum_f_R0
  (fun k : nat =>
   sum_f_R0
     (fun l : nat =>
      (-1) ^ S (l + k) / INR (fact (2 * S (l + k))) *
      x ^ (2 * S (l + k)) *
      ((-1) ^ (S n - l) / INR (fact (2 * (S n - l))) *
       y ^ (2 * (S n - l)))) 
     (Init.Nat.pred (S n - k))) 
  (Init.Nat.pred (S n))

H:(0 < n)%nat
sin_nnn:=fun n0 : nat =>
match n0 with
| 0%nat => 0
| S p =>
    (-1) ^ S p / INR (fact (2 * S p)) *
    sum_f_R0
      (fun l : nat =>
       C (2 * S p) (S (2 * l)) *
       x ^ S (2 * l) * y ^ S (2 * (p - l))) p
end:nat -> R
i:nat
H0:(i <= n)%nat
sin_nnn (S i) =
-1 *
sum_f_R0
  (fun p : nat =>
   (-1) ^ p / INR (fact (2 * p + 1)) * x ^ (2 * p + 1) *
   ((-1) ^ (i - p) / INR (fact (2 * (i - p) + 1)) *
    y ^ (2 * (i - p) + 1))) i

   sum_f_R0
     (fun l : nat =>
      (-1) ^ S (l + k) / INR (fact (2 * S (l + k))) *
      x ^ (2 * S (l + k)) *
      ((-1) ^ (S n - l) / INR (fact (2 * (S n - l))) *
       y ^ (2 * (S n - l)))) 
     (Init.Nat.pred (S n - k))) 
  (Init.Nat.pred (S n))
x, y:R
n:nat
H:(0 < n)%nat
(0 < S n)%nat

(*repeat rewrite Rmult_assoc.*)
(* rewrite (Rmult_comm (/ INR (fact (2 * S i)))). *)

x, y:R
n:nat
H:(0 < n)%nat
sin_nnn:=fun n0 : nat =>
match n0 with
| 0%nat => 0
| S p =>
    (-1) ^ S p / INR (fact (2 * S p)) *
    sum_f_R0
      (fun l : nat =>
       C (2 * S p) (S (2 * l)) *
       x ^ S (2 * l) * y ^ S (2 * (p - l))) p
end:nat -> R
i:nat
H0:(i <= n)%nat
i0:nat
H1:(i0 <= i)%nat
C (2 * S i) (S (2 * i0)) * x ^ S (2 * i0) *
y ^ S (2 * (i - i0)) * (-1) ^ S i *
/ INR (fact (2 * S i)) =
(-1) ^ i0 * / INR (fact (2 * i0 + 1)) *
x ^ (2 * i0 + 1) * (-1) ^ (i - i0) *
/ INR (fact (2 * (i - i0) + 1)) *
y ^ (2 * (i - i0) + 1) * -1
x, y:R
n:nat
H:(0 < n)%nat
sin_nnn:=fun n0 : nat =>
match n0 with
| 0%nat => 0
| S p =>
    (-1) ^ S p / INR (fact (2 * S p)) *
    sum_f_R0
      (fun l : nat =>
       C (2 * S p) (S (2 * l)) *
       x ^ S (2 * l) * y ^ S (2 * (p - l))) p
end:nat -> R
0 = sin_nnn 0%nat

sum_f_R0
  (fun k : nat =>
   (-1) ^ k / INR (fact (2 * k)) *
   sum_f_R0
     (fun l : nat =>
      C (2 * k) (2 * l) * x ^ (2 * l) *
      y ^ (2 * (k - l))) k) 
  (S n) =
sum_f_R0
  (fun k : nat =>
   sum_f_R0
     (fun p : nat =>
      (-1) ^ p / INR (fact (2 * p)) * x ^ (2 * p) *
      ((-1) ^ (k - p) / INR (fact (2 * (k - p))) *
       y ^ (2 * (k - p)))) k) 
  (S n)
x, y:R

sum_f_R0
  (fun k : nat =>
   sum_f_R0
     (fun l : nat =>
      (-1) ^ S (l + k) /
      INR (fact (2 * S (l + k) + 1)) *
      x ^ (2 * S (l + k) + 1) *
      ((-1) ^ (n - l) / INR (fact (2 * (n - l) + 1)) *
       y ^ (2 * (n - l) + 1))) 
     (Init.Nat.pred (n - k))) 
  (Init.Nat.pred n)

x, y:R
n:nat
H:(0 < n)%nat
Reste2 x y n =
sum_f_R0
  (fun k : nat =>
   sum_f_R0
     (fun l : nat =>
      (-1) ^ S (l + k) /
      INR (fact (2 * S (l + k) + 1)) *
      x ^ (2 * S (l + k) + 1) *
      ((-1) ^ (n - l) / INR (fact (2 * (n - l) + 1)) *
       y ^ (2 * (n - l) + 1))) 
     (Init.Nat.pred (n - k))) 
  (Init.Nat.pred n)
x, y:R
n:nat
H:(0 < n)%nat
Reste1 x y (S n) =
sum_f_R0
  (fun k : nat =>
   sum_f_R0
     (fun l : nat =>
      (-1) ^ S (l + k) / INR (fact (2 * S (l + k))) *
      x ^ (2 * S (l + k)) *
      ((-1) ^ (S n - l) / INR (fact (2 * (S n - l))) *
       y ^ (2 * (S n - l)))) 
     (Init.Nat.pred (S n - k))) 
  (Init.Nat.pred (S n))
x, y:R
n:nat
H:(0 < n)%nat
(0 < S n)%nat


x, y:R
n:nat
H:(0 < n)%nat
sin_nnn:=fun n0 : nat =>
match n0 with
| 0%nat => 0
| S p =>
    (-1) ^ S p / INR (fact (2 * S p)) *
    sum_f_R0
      (fun l : nat =>
       C (2 * S p) (S (2 * l)) *
       x ^ S (2 * l) * y ^ S (2 * (p - l))) p
end:nat -> R
i:nat
H0:(i <= n)%nat
i0:nat
H1:(i0 <= i)%nat
/ INR (fact (2 * i0 + 1)) *
/ INR (fact (2 * (i - i0) + 1)) * 
x ^ (2 * i0 + 1) * y ^ (2 * (i - i0) + 1) *
(-1 * (-1) ^ i0 * (-1) ^ (i - i0)) =
(-1) ^ i0 * / INR (fact (2 * i0 + 1)) *
x ^ (2 * i0 + 1) * (-1) ^ (i - i0) *
/ INR (fact (2 * (i - i0) + 1)) *
y ^ (2 * (i - i0) + 1) * -1
x, y:R
n:nat
H:(0 < n)%nat
sin_nnn:=fun n0 : nat =>
match n0 with
| 0%nat => 0
| S p =>
    (-1) ^ S p / INR (fact (2 * S p)) *
    sum_f_R0
      (fun l : nat =>
       C (2 * S p) (S (2 * l)) *
       x ^ S (2 * l) * y ^ S (2 * (p - l))) p
end:nat -> R
i:nat
H0:(i <= n)%nat
i0:nat
H1:(i0 <= i)%nat
-1 * (-1) ^ i0 * (-1) ^ (i - i0) = (-1) ^ S i
x, y:R
n:nat
H:(0 < n)%nat
sin_nnn:=fun n0 : nat =>
match n0 with
| 0%nat => 0
| S p =>
    (-1) ^ S p / INR (fact (2 * S p)) *
    sum_f_R0
      (fun l : nat =>
       C (2 * S p) (S (2 * l)) *
       x ^ S (2 * l) * y ^ S (2 * (p - l))) p
end:nat -> R
i:nat
H0:(i <= n)%nat
i0:nat
H1:(i0 <= i)%nat
/ INR (fact (2 * i0 + 1)) *
/ INR (fact (2 * (i - i0) + 1)) =
/ INR (fact (2 * S i)) * C (2 * S i) (S (2 * i0))
x, y:R
n:nat

sin_nnn:=fun n0 : nat =>

    sum_f_R0
      (fun l : nat =>
       C (2 * S p) (S (2 * l)) *
       x ^ S (2 * l) * y ^ S (2 * (p - l))) p
end:nat -> R
0 = sin_nnn 0%nat

H:(0 < n)%nat
sum_f_R0
  (fun k : nat =>
   (-1) ^ k / INR (fact (2 * k)) *
   sum_f_R0
     (fun l : nat =>
      C (2 * k) (2 * l) * x ^ (2 * l) *
      y ^ (2 * (k - l))) k) 
  (S n) =
sum_f_R0
  (fun k : nat =>
   sum_f_R0
     (fun p : nat =>
      (-1) ^ p / INR (fact (2 * p)) * x ^ (2 * p) *
      ((-1) ^ (k - p) / INR (fact (2 * (k - p))) *
       y ^ (2 * (k - p)))) k) 
  (S n)

| 0%nat => 0
| S p =>
    (-1) ^ S p / INR (fact (2 * S p)) *
    sum_f_R0
      (fun l : nat =>
       C (2 * S p) (S (2 * l)) *
       x ^ S (2 * l) * y ^ S (2 * (p - l))) p
end:nat -> R
i:nat
H0:(i <= n)%nat
i0:nat
H1:(i0 <= i)%nat
(i0 + (i - i0))%nat = i
x, y:R
n:nat
H:(0 < n)%nat
sin_nnn:=fun n0 : nat =>
match n0 with
| 0%nat => 0
| S p =>
    (-1) ^ S p / INR (fact (2 * S p)) *
    sum_f_R0
      (fun l : nat =>
       C (2 * S p) (S (2 * l)) *
       x ^ S (2 * l) * y ^ S (2 * (p - l))) p
end:nat -> R
i:nat
H0:(i <= n)%nat
i0:nat
H1:(i0 <= i)%nat
/ INR (fact (2 * i0 + 1)) *
/ INR (fact (2 * (i - i0) + 1)) =
/ INR (fact (2 * S i)) * C (2 * S i) (S (2 * i0))
x, y:R
n:nat

sin_nnn:=fun n0 : nat =>
match n0 with
| 0%nat => 0

    sum_f_R0
      (fun l : nat =>
       C (2 * S p) (S (2 * l)) *
       x ^ S (2 * l) * y ^ S (2 * (p - l))) p
end:nat -> R
0 = sin_nnn 0%nat

sin_nnn:=fun n0 : nat =>
match n0 with
| 0%nat => 0
| S p =>
    (-1) ^ S p / INR (fact (2 * S p)) *
    sum_f_R0
      (fun l : nat =>
       C (2 * S p) (S (2 * l)) *
       x ^ S (2 * l) * y ^ S (2 * (p - l))) p

n:nat
H:(0 < n)%nat
sum_f_R0
  (fun k : nat =>
   (-1) ^ k / INR (fact (2 * k)) *
   sum_f_R0
     (fun l : nat =>
      C (2 * k) (2 * l) * x ^ (2 * l) *
      y ^ (2 * (k - l))) k) 
  (S n) =
sum_f_R0
  (fun k : nat =>
   sum_f_R0
     (fun p : nat =>
      (-1) ^ p / INR (fact (2 * p)) * x ^ (2 * p) *
      ((-1) ^ (k - p) / INR (fact (2 * (k - p))) *
       y ^ (2 * (k - p)))) k) 
  (S n)
x, y:R
n:nat
H:(0 < n)%nat
Reste2 x y n =
sum_f_R0
  (fun k : nat =>
   sum_f_R0
     (fun l : nat =>
      (-1) ^ S (l + k) /
      INR (fact (2 * S (l + k) + 1)) *
      x ^ (2 * S (l + k) + 1) *
      ((-1) ^ (n - l) / INR (fact (2 * (n - l) + 1)) *
       y ^ (2 * (n - l) + 1))) 
     (Init.Nat.pred (n - k))) 
  (Init.Nat.pred n)
x, y:R
n:nat
H:(0 < n)%nat
Reste1 x y (S n) =
sum_f_R0
  (fun k : nat =>
   sum_f_R0
     (fun l : nat =>
      (-1) ^ S (l + k) / INR (fact (2 * S (l + k))) *
      x ^ (2 * S (l + k)) *
      ((-1) ^ (S n - l) / INR (fact (2 * (S n - l))) *
       y ^ (2 * (S n - l)))) 
     (Init.Nat.pred (S n - k))) 
  (Init.Nat.pred (S n))

H1:(i0 <= i)%nat
INR (fact (S (2 * i0))) <> 0
x, y:R
n:nat
H:(0 < n)%nat
sin_nnn:=fun n0 : nat =>
match n0 with
| 0%nat => 0
| S p =>
    (-1) ^ S p / INR (fact (2 * S p)) *
    sum_f_R0
      (fun l : nat =>
       C (2 * S p) (S (2 * l)) *
       x ^ S (2 * l) * y ^ S (2 * (p - l))) p
end:nat -> R
i:nat
H0:(i <= n)%nat
i0:nat
H1:(i0 <= i)%nat
INR (fact (2 * S i - S (2 * i0))) <> 0

n:nat
H:(0 < n)%nat
sum_f_R0
  (fun k : nat =>
   (-1) ^ k / INR (fact (2 * k)) *
   sum_f_R0
     (fun l : nat =>
      C (2 * k) (2 * l) * x ^ (2 * l) *
      y ^ (2 * (k - l))) k) 
  (S n) =
sum_f_R0
  (fun k : nat =>
   sum_f_R0
     (fun p : nat =>
      (-1) ^ p / INR (fact (2 * p)) * x ^ (2 * p) *
      ((-1) ^ (k - p) / INR (fact (2 * (k - p))) *
       y ^ (2 * (k - p)))) k) 
  (S n)
x, y:R
n:nat
H:(0 < n)%nat
Reste2 x y n =
sum_f_R0
  (fun k : nat =>
   sum_f_R0
     (fun l : nat =>
      (-1) ^ S (l + k) /
      INR (fact (2 * S (l + k) + 1)) *
      x ^ (2 * S (l + k) + 1) *
      ((-1) ^ (n - l) / INR (fact (2 * (n - l) + 1)) *
       y ^ (2 * (n - l) + 1))) 
     (Init.Nat.pred (n - k))) 
  (Init.Nat.pred n)
x, y:R
n:nat
H:(0 < n)%nat
Reste1 x y (S n) =
sum_f_R0
  (fun k : nat =>
   sum_f_R0
     (fun l : nat =>
      (-1) ^ S (l + k) / INR (fact (2 * S (l + k))) *
      x ^ (2 * S (l + k)) *
      ((-1) ^ (S n - l) / INR (fact (2 * (S n - l))) *
       y ^ (2 * (S n - l)))) 
     (Init.Nat.pred (S n - k))) 
  (Init.Nat.pred (S n))
x, y:R

   sum_f_R0
     (fun l : nat =>
      (-1) ^ S (l + k) / INR (fact (2 * S (l + k))) *
      x ^ (2 * S (l + k)) *
      ((-1) ^ (S n - l) / INR (fact (2 * (S n - l))) *
       y ^ (2 * (S n - l)))) 
     (Init.Nat.pred (S n - k))) 
  (Init.Nat.pred (S n))
x, y:R
n:nat
H:(0 < n)%nat
(0 < S n)%nat


x, y:R
n:nat
H:(0 < n)%nat
sin_nnn:=fun n0 : nat =>
match n0 with
| 0%nat => 0
| S p =>
    (-1) ^ S p / INR (fact (2 * S p)) *
    sum_f_R0
      (fun l : nat =>
       C (2 * S p) (S (2 * l)) *
       x ^ S (2 * l) * y ^ S (2 * (p - l))) p
end:nat -> R
i:nat
H0:(i <= n)%nat
i0:nat
H1:(i0 <= i)%nat
INR (fact (2 * S i - S (2 * i0))) <> 0
x, y:R

   sum_f_R0

      C (2 * k) (2 * l) * x ^ (2 * l) *
      y ^ (2 * (k - l))) k) 
  (S n) =

  (fun k : nat =>
   sum_f_R0
     (fun p : nat =>
      (-1) ^ p / INR (fact (2 * p)) * x ^ (2 * p) *
      ((-1) ^ (k - p) / INR (fact (2 * (k - p))) *
       y ^ (2 * (k - p)))) k) 
  (S n)

      ((-1) ^ (n - l) / INR (fact (2 * (n - l) + 1)) *
       y ^ (2 * (n - l) + 1))) 
     (Init.Nat.pred (n - k))) 
  (Init.Nat.pred n)

H:(0 < n)%nat
i:nat
H0:(i <= S n)%nat
(-1) ^ i / INR (fact (2 * i)) *
sum_f_R0
  (fun l : nat =>
   C (2 * i) (2 * l) * x ^ (2 * l) * y ^ (2 * (i - l)))
  i =
sum_f_R0
  (fun p : nat =>
   (-1) ^ p / INR (fact (2 * p)) * x ^ (2 * p) *
   ((-1) ^ (i - p) / INR (fact (2 * (i - p))) *
    y ^ (2 * (i - p)))) i
x, y:R
n:nat

      (-1) ^ S (l + k) /
      INR (fact (2 * S (l + k) + 1)) *
      x ^ (2 * S (l + k) + 1) *
      ((-1) ^ (n - l) / INR (fact (2 * (n - l) + 1)) *
       y ^ (2 * (n - l) + 1))) 
     (Init.Nat.pred (n - k))) 
  (Init.Nat.pred n)

((-1) ^ i / INR (fact (2 * i))) =

((-1) ^ (i - i0) / INR (fact (2 * (i - i0))) *
 y ^ (2 * (i - i0)))

(-1) ^ i0 * / INR (fact (2 * i0)) * x ^ (2 * i0) *
((-1) ^ (i - i0) * / INR (fact (2 * (i - i0))) *
 y ^ (2 * (i - i0)))

      (-1) ^ S (l + k) / INR (fact (2 * S (l + k))) *
      x ^ (2 * S (l + k)) *
      ((-1) ^ (S n - l) / INR (fact (2 * (S n - l))) *

i0:nat
H1:(i0 <= i)%nat
C (2 * i) (2 * i0) * x ^ (2 * i0) * y ^ (2 * (i - i0)) *
(-1) ^ i * / INR (fact (2 * i)) =
(-1) ^ i0 * / INR (fact (2 * i0)) * x ^ (2 * i0) *
(-1) ^ (i - i0) * / INR (fact (2 * (i - i0))) *
y ^ (2 * (i - i0))

H:(0 < n)%nat
Reste2 x y n =
sum_f_R0
  (fun k : nat =>
   sum_f_R0
     (fun l : nat =>
      (-1) ^ S (l + k) /
      INR (fact (2 * S (l + k) + 1)) *
      x ^ (2 * S (l + k) + 1) *
      ((-1) ^ (n - l) / INR (fact (2 * (n - l) + 1)) *
       y ^ (2 * (n - l) + 1))) 
     (Init.Nat.pred (n - k))) 
  (Init.Nat.pred n)
x, y:R
n:nat
H:(0 < n)%nat
Reste1 x y (S n) =
sum_f_R0
  (fun k : nat =>
   sum_f_R0
     (fun l : nat =>
      (-1) ^ S (l + k) / INR (fact (2 * S (l + k))) *
      x ^ (2 * S (l + k)) *
      ((-1) ^ (S n - l) / INR (fact (2 * (S n - l))) *
       y ^ (2 * (S n - l)))) 
     (Init.Nat.pred (S n - k))) 
  (Init.Nat.pred (S n))
x, y:R
n:nat
H:(0 < n)%nat
(0 < S n)%nat


x, y:R
n:nat
H:(0 < n)%nat
i:nat
H0:(i <= S n)%nat
i0:nat
H1:(i0 <= i)%nat
/ INR (fact (2 * i)) *
(C (2 * i) (2 * i0) * x ^ (2 * i0) *
 y ^ (2 * (i - i0)) * (-1) ^ i) =
(-1) ^ i0 * / INR (fact (2 * i0)) * x ^ (2 * i0) *
(-1) ^ (i - i0) * / INR (fact (2 * (i - i0))) *
y ^ (2 * (i - i0))
x, y:R
n:nat
H:(0 < n)%nat
Reste2 x y n =
sum_f_R0
  (fun k : nat =>
   sum_f_R0
     (fun l : nat =>
      (-1) ^ S (l + k) /
      INR (fact (2 * S (l + k) + 1)) *
      x ^ (2 * S (l + k) + 1) *
      ((-1) ^ (n - l) / INR (fact (2 * (n - l) + 1)) *
       y ^ (2 * (n - l) + 1))) 
     (Init.Nat.pred (n - k))) 
  (Init.Nat.pred n)
x, y:R
n:nat
H:(0 < n)%nat
Reste1 x y (S n) =
sum_f_R0
  (fun k : nat =>
   sum_f_R0
     (fun l : nat =>
      (-1) ^ S (l + k) / INR (fact (2 * S (l + k))) *
      x ^ (2 * S (l + k)) *
      ((-1) ^ (S n - l) / INR (fact (2 * (S n - l))) *
       y ^ (2 * (S n - l)))) 
     (Init.Nat.pred (S n - k))) 
  (Init.Nat.pred (S n))
x, y:R
n:nat
H:(0 < n)%nat
(0 < S n)%nat


x, y:R
n:nat
H:(0 < n)%nat
i:nat
H0:(i <= S n)%nat
i0:nat
H1:(i0 <= i)%nat
/ INR (fact (2 * i)) * C (2 * i) (2 * i0) *
x ^ (2 * i0) * y ^ (2 * (i - i0)) * 
(-1) ^ i =
(-1) ^ i0 * / INR (fact (2 * i0)) * x ^ (2 * i0) *
(-1) ^ (i - i0) * / INR (fact (2 * (i - i0))) *
y ^ (2 * (i - i0))
x, y:R

Reste2 x y n =
sum_f_R0
  (fun k : nat =>
   sum_f_R0
     (fun l : nat =>
      (-1) ^ S (l + k) /
      INR (fact (2 * S (l + k) + 1)) *
      x ^ (2 * S (l + k) + 1) *
      ((-1) ^ (n - l) / INR (fact (2 * (n - l) + 1)) *
       y ^ (2 * (n - l) + 1))) 
     (Init.Nat.pred (n - k))) 
  (Init.Nat.pred n)
x, y:R
n:nat
H:(0 < n)%nat
Reste1 x y (S n) =
sum_f_R0
  (fun k : nat =>
   sum_f_R0
     (fun l : nat =>
      (-1) ^ S (l + k) / INR (fact (2 * S (l + k))) *
      x ^ (2 * S (l + k)) *
      ((-1) ^ (S n - l) / INR (fact (2 * (S n - l))) *
       y ^ (2 * (S n - l)))) 
     (Init.Nat.pred (S n - k))) 
  (Init.Nat.pred (S n))
x, y:R

H:(0 < n)%nat
(0 < S n)%nat

/ INR (fact (2 * i0)) * / INR (fact (2 * (i - i0))) =
/ INR (fact (2 * i0)) * / INR (fact (2 * (i - i0)))

forall (x : R) (i : nat), x ^ (2 * i) = (x * x) ^ i


forall (x : R) (i : nat), x ^ (2 * i) = (x * x) ^ i


x:R
i:nat
x ^ (2 * i) = (x * x) ^ i


x:R
i:nat
H:x ^ (2 * i) = x¬≤ ^ i
x ^ (2 * i) = (x * x) ^ i

unfold Rsqr in H; exact H.
Qed.


forall x : R, Un_cv (A1 x) (cos x)


forall x : R, Un_cv (A1 x) (cos x)


x:R
Un_cv (A1 x) (cos x)


x, x0:R
p:cos_in x¬≤ x0
Un_cv (A1 x) x0


x, x0:R
p:forall eps : R,
eps > 0 ->
exists N : nat,
  forall n : nat,
  (n >= N)%nat ->
  Rabs
    (sum_f_R0
       (fun i : nat =>
        (-1) ^ i / INR (fact (2 * i)) * x¬≤ ^ i) n -
     x0) < eps

H0:forall n0 : nat,
(n0 >= x1)%nat ->

  (sum_f_R0
     (fun i : nat =>
      (-1) ^ i / INR (fact (2 * i)) * x¬≤ ^ i) n0 -
   x0) < eps

H1:(n >= x1)%nat

(i <= n)%nat ->
(-1) ^ i / INR (fact (2 * i)) * (x * x) ^ i =
(-1) ^ i / INR (fact (2 * i)) * x ^ (2 * i)

    (sum_f_R0
       (fun i : nat =>
        (-1) ^ i / INR (fact (2 * i + 1)) * x¬≤ ^ i)
       n0 - x0) < eps0
eps:R
H0:eps > 0
H1:0 < eps / Rabs x
x1:nat
H2:forall n0 : nat,
(n0 >= x1)%nat ->

  (sum_f_R0
     (fun i : nat =>

     n0 - x0) < eps / Rabs x

      x ^ (2 * k + 1)) n - 
   x * x0) < eps

forall i : nat,
(i <= n)%nat ->
(-1) ^ i / INR (fact (2 * i + 1)) * (x * x) ^ i * x =
(-1) ^ i / INR (fact (2 * i + 1)) * x ^ (2 * i + 1)

eps0 > 0 ->

  forall n0 : nat,

  (sum_f_R0

      x¬≤ ^ i0) n0 - x0) <

H3:(n >= x1)%nat

H4:(i <= n)%nat

(-1) ^ i / INR (fact (2 * i + 1)) * x ^ (2 * i + 1)

H:x <> 0
x0:R
p:forall eps0 : R,
eps0 > 0 ->
exists N : nat,
  forall n0 : nat,
  (n0 >= N)%nat ->
  Rabs
    (sum_f_R0
       (fun i0 : nat =>
        (-1) ^ i0 / INR (fact (2 * i0 + 1)) *
        x¬≤ ^ i0) n0 - x0) < eps0
eps:R
H0:eps > 0
H1:0 < eps / Rabs x
x1:nat
H2:forall n0 : nat,
(n0 >= x1)%nat ->
Rabs
  (sum_f_R0
     (fun i0 : nat =>
      (-1) ^ i0 / INR (fact (2 * i0 + 1)) *
      x¬≤ ^ i0) n0 - x0) < 
eps / Rabs x
n:nat
H3:(n >= x1)%nat
i:nat
H4:(i <= n)%nat
(-1) ^ i / INR (fact (2 * i + 1)) * (x * x) ^ i * x =
(-1) ^ i / INR (fact (2 * i + 1)) *
(x ^ (2 * i) * x ^ 1)

H:x <> 0
x0:R
p:forall eps0 : R,
eps0 > 0 ->
exists N : nat,
  forall n0 : nat,
  (n0 >= N)%nat ->
  Rabs
    (sum_f_R0
       (fun i0 : nat =>
        (-1) ^ i0 / INR (fact (2 * i0 + 1)) *
        x¬≤ ^ i0) n0 - x0) < eps0
eps:R
H0:eps > 0
H1:0 < eps / Rabs x
x1:nat
H2:forall n0 : nat,
(n0 >= x1)%nat ->
Rabs
  (sum_f_R0
     (fun i0 : nat =>
      (-1) ^ i0 / INR (fact (2 * i0 + 1)) *
      x¬≤ ^ i0) n0 - x0) < 
eps / Rabs x
n:nat
H3:(n >= x1)%nat
i:nat
H4:(i <= n)%nat
(-1) ^ i / INR (fact (2 * i + 1)) * (x * x) ^ i * x =
(-1) ^ i / INR (fact (2 * i + 1)) *
((x * x) ^ i * x ^ 1)


x:R
H:x <> 0
x0:R
p:forall eps0 : R,
eps0 > 0 ->
exists N : nat,
  forall n0 : nat,
  (n0 >= N)%nat ->
  Rabs
    (sum_f_R0
       (fun i0 : nat =>
        (-1) ^ i0 / INR (fact (2 * i0 + 1)) *
        x¬≤ ^ i0) n0 - x0) < eps0
eps:R
H0:eps > 0
H1:0 < eps / Rabs x
x1:nat
H2:forall n0 : nat,
(n0 >= x1)%nat ->
Rabs
  (sum_f_R0
     (fun i0 : nat =>
      (-1) ^ i0 / INR (fact (2 * i0 + 1)) *
      x¬≤ ^ i0) n0 - x0) < 
eps / Rabs x
n:nat
H3:(n >= x1)%nat
i:nat
H4:(i <= n)%nat
(-1) ^ i / INR (fact (i + (i + 0) + 1)) * (x * x) ^ i *
x =
(-1) ^ i / INR (fact (i + (i + 0) + 1)) *
((x * x) ^ i * (x * 1))

ring.
Qed.
